## Checklist
<!-- FR: Vérifiez tous les points avant de soumettre -->
<!-- Verify all points before submitting -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have run `pre-commit run --all-files` and all checks pass
- [ ] I have added type hints to new code
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix/feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally
- [ ] Test coverage has not decreased

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG (if applicable)
- [ ] I have added docstrings to new functions/classes

### Breaking Changes
<!-- FR: Si votre PR introduit des changements cassants -->
<!-- If your PR introduces breaking changes -->

- [ ] I have documented migration steps (if breaking changes)
- [ ] I have updated deprecation warnings (if applicable)
